properties.name: aiode.server.port
properties.description: Port for the legacy html server.

properties.name: aiode.server.base_uri
properties.description: Base uri to use for all endpoints.

properties.name: aiode.preferences.youtube_api_daily_quota
properties.description: The daily api quota provided by the YouTube data API. Aiode will limit quota usage according to this property.

properties.name: aiode.preferences.mode_partitioned
properties.description: Whether data should be split across guilds. If false all guilds share the same playlists, presets, scripts etc.

properties.name: aiode.preferences.queue_size_max
properties.description: The maximum number of tracks in the queue per guild.

properties.name: aiode.preferences.playlist_count_max
properties.description: Maximum number of playlists per guild (or in total if mode_partitioned is false).

properties.name: aiode.preferences.playlist_size_max
properties.description: Maximum number of tracks in one playlist.

properties.name: aiode.preferences.preset_count_max
properties.description: Maximum number of presets per guild (or in total if mode_partitioned is false).

properties.name: aiode.preferences.script_count_max
properties.description: Maximum number of scripts per guild (or in total if mode_partitioned is false).

properties.name: aiode.preferences.interceptor_count_max
properties.description: Maximum number of interceptors and finalizers per guild (or in total if mode_partitioned is false).

properties.name: aiode.preferences.custom_permission_target_max
properties.description: Maximum number of custom permission targets per guild (or in total if mode_partitioned is false).

properties.name: aiode.preferences.max_heap_size
properties.description: Maximum JVM heap size for the bootRun task.

properties.name: aiode.preferences.enable_scripting
properties.description: Disable / enable commands in the scripting category and custom scripted command interceptors.

properties.name: aiode.preferences.spotify_market
properties.description: The country code of the default spotify market to use for spotify API requests, can be manually set for AbstractPlayableLoadingCommand commands using the 'market' argument.

properties.name: aiode.preferences.native_audio_buffer
properties.description: The amount of milliseconds of audio to buffer and stream using native code to avoid stutters caused by garbage collection activity. Ignored if not on Linux / Windows and amd64 / x86 and disabled if 0.

properties.name: aiode.preferences.shard_total
properties.description: The total number of gateway shards, -1 means the total will be fetched from discord automatically, shard_range is not supported in that case.

properties.name: aiode.preferences.shard_range
properties.description: Range of shards this node should launch, can't be set if shard_total is -1, includes both endpoints of the range, e.g. "0-15".

properties.name: aiode.preferences.main_instance
properties.description: Determines if this bot instance is the main instance and will not run certain startup tasks or cron jobs otherwise. Should only be false in a multi instance environment, there should be exactly one main_instance.
